steps: Peel the carrots and cut into thin slices.
Heat a pan with some oil over medium heat.
Add the sliced carrots to the pan and stir fry for 3-4 minutes until they begin to soften.
Push the carrots to the side of the pan and crack the eggs into the empty space.
Scramble the eggs until they are cooked through.
Mix the scrambled eggs with the carrots and continue to stir fry for another 2-3 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
